xal.tools.math.differential

Class DifferentiableOperationMinimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.tools.math.differential.DifferentiableOperationMinimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DifferentiableOperationMinimizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Perform minimization on a differentiable operation
